channel.title: Request Speed ​​ONION Service V3
channel.description:
Dear`s
I now have three Hidden Serice V3 running. Is it normal that the speed is twice as high as V2? I do not even notice that it is a hidden service.
ef86

item.title: Request Speed ​​ONION Service V3
item.dc:creator: ef86
item.description:
Dear 0brand,

I am completely satisfied with the V3 Onion service so far. One can only hope that it stays that way.

Read full topic

item.title: Request Speed ​​ONION Service V3
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi ef86

Thats awesome! However, since v3 was released many users are reporting slower speeds compared to v2. There is still testing to be done and may be some time before all v3 .onion features are released and more Hidden Service operators make the switch to v3. I think/hope speeds (in general) will improve.

Read full topic
